long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple persistent todo/checklist extension for Chrome. Add your todo's, checklist, click them off!

An interactive extension that allows you to write down quick tasks to complete and checkout. Available with just a click, and keeps the items until you remove them or check them back to do them again.

Simple. Easy.
